title: When will there be a restock
content:
Hi there, this is an absolute long shot but I was wondering whether you could give me any kind of info when the Google pixel 5 will be restocked in sage? My current phone has had a lot of issues and I'm holding out to move to the Google phone until I really need it / the colour becomes available again but my phone's loosing life more and more each day but I'm not ready to settle.

Thank you :)
